languages.text: {n}Псайкер в ужасе и недоумении переводит взгляд с устройства то на вас, то на мертвого эльдара.{/n} "Этот ксенос... Ты видел{mf||а} его глаза перед тем, как он напал на нас, {name}? В них словно все потухло. И все из-за этой штуки? Я не хочу умирать, но... Но я не хочу жить так же. Если я перестану быть собой, то какой смысл во всем этом?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Псайкер в ужасе и недоумении переводит взгляд с устройства то на вас, то на мертвого эльдара.{/n} "Этот ксенос... Ты видел{mf||а} его глаза перед тем, как он напал на нас, {name}? В них словно все потухло — остались только горечь и безразличие. И все из-за этой штуки? Я не хочу умирать, но... Но я не хочу жить также. Если я перестану быть собой, то какой смысл во всем этом? Ты соглас{mf|ен|на}?"

languages.text: {n}Terrified and confused, Idira looks at the device, then at you, then at the dead Aeldari.{/n} "That xenos... {name}, did you see his eyes right before he attacked us? It was like there was no light left in them. And it's all because of this thing? I don't want to die, but... I don't want to live like that either. If it means I'll stop being myself, then what's the point?"
languages.original_text: {n}Псайкер в ужасе и недоумении переводит взгляд с устройства то на вас, то на мертвого эльдара.{/n} "Этот ксенос... Ты видел{mf||а} его глаза перед тем, как он напал на нас, {name}? В них словно все потухло. И все из-за этой штуки? Я не хочу умирать, но... Но я не хочу жить так же. Если я перестану быть собой, то какой смысл во всем этом?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Terrified and confused, Idira looks at the device, then at you, then at the dead Aeldari.{/n} "That xenos... {name}, did you see his eyes right before he attacked us? It's like there was no light left in them. And it's all because of this thing? I don't want to die, but... I don't want to live like that either. If it means I'll stop being myself, then what's the point?"

It was like there was no light left in them. And it's all because of this thing? I don't want to die, but... I don't want to live like that either. {n}Terrified and confused, Idira looks at the device, then at you, then at the dead Aeldari.{/n} "That xenos... {name}, did you see his eyes right before he attacked us? It was like there was no light left in them. And it's all because of this thing? I don't want to die, but... I don't want to live like that either. If it means I'll stop being myself, then what's the point?"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉看了看异形装置，又看了看你，之后看着倒在地上的艾达灵族，她的目光中充满了惊恐与困惑。{/n}“那只异形……他袭击我们之前，你看到他的眼睛了吗，{name}？看起来就好像所有光芒都消失了一样。都是因为这个东西搞的鬼吗？我不想死，但……我也不想像那样活着。就算能活着，我也不再是我自己了，那这还有什么意义呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified and confused, Idira looks at the device, then at you, then at the dead Aeldari.{/n} "That xenos... {name}, did you see his eyes right before he attacked us? It was like there was no light left in them. And it's all because of this thing? I don't want to die, but... I don't want to live like that either. If it means I'll stop being myself, then what's the point?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉看了看异形装置，又看了看你，之后看着倒在地上的艾达灵族，她的目光中充满了惊恐与困惑。{/n}“那只异形……他袭击我们之前，你看到他的眼睛了吗，{name}？看起来就好像所有光芒都消失了一样。都是因为这个东西搞的鬼吗？我不想死，但……我也不想像那样活着。就算能活着，我也不再是我自己了，那这还有什么意义呢？”

languages.text: {n}Aterrada y confusa, Idira pasa la mirada del dispositivo a ti y después al Aeldari muerto.{/n} «Ese xenos... {name}, ¿viste sus ojos justo antes de que nos atacara? Era como si no hubiera ninguna luz en ellos. ¿Y es culpa de esta cosa? No quiero morir, pero... tampoco quiero vivir así. Si implica dejar de ser yo misma, ¿de qué me sirve?».
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified and confused, Idira looks at the device, then at you, then at the dead Aeldari.{/n} "That xenos... {name}, did you see his eyes right before he attacked us? It was like there was no light left in them. And it's all because of this thing? I don't want to die, but... I don't want to live like that either. If it means I'll stop being myself, then what's the point?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Aterrada y confusa, Idira pasa la mirada del dispositivo a ti y después al Aeldari muerto.{/n} «Ese xenos... {name}, ¿viste sus ojos justo antes de que nos atacara? Era como si no hubiera ninguna luz en ellos. ¿Y es culpa de esta cosa? No quiero morir, pero... tampoco quiero vivir así. Si implica dejar de ser yo misma, ¿de qué me sirve?».

languages.text: {n}Verängstigt und verwirrt blickt Idira das Gerät an, dann dich, dann den toten Aeldari.{/n} "Dieser Xenos ... {name}, habt Ihr seine Augen gesehen, bevor er uns angegriffen hat? Es war, als sei kein Licht mehr in ihnen. Und das alles nur wegen dieses Dings? Ich will nicht sterben, aber ... ich will auch nicht so leben. Wenn das heißt, dass ich nicht länger ich selbst bin, welches Sinn hat es dann?"
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified and confused, Idira looks at the device, then at you, then at the dead Aeldari.{/n} "That xenos... {name}, did you see his eyes right before he attacked us? It was like there was no light left in them. And it's all because of this thing? I don't want to die, but... I don't want to live like that either. If it means I'll stop being myself, then what's the point?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Verängstigt und verwirrt blickt Idira das Gerät an, dann dich, dann den toten Aeldari.{/n} "Dieser Xenos ... {name}, habt Ihr seine Augen gesehen, bevor er uns angegriffen hat? Es war, als sei kein Licht mehr in ihnen. Und das alles nur wegen dieses Dings? Ich will nicht sterben, aber ... ich will auch nicht so leben. Wenn das heißt, dass ich nicht länger ich selbst bin, welches Sinn hat es dann?"

languages.text: {n}イディラは恐怖と混乱の中、装置とあなたを見たあと、最後に死んだアエルダリに目を向けた。{/n}「あのゼノ…。{name}、私たちを攻撃する直前の彼の目を見た？まるで光がないようだったわ。全部、これが原因なの？私は死にたくはないけど…あんな生き方もしたくない。だって自分が自分でなくなるのなら、何の意味もないでしょう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified and confused, Idira looks at the device, then at you, then at the dead Aeldari.{/n} "That xenos... {name}, did you see his eyes right before he attacked us? It was like there was no light left in them. And it's all because of this thing? I don't want to die, but... I don't want to live like that either. If it means I'll stop being myself, then what's the point?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは恐怖と混乱の中、装置とあなたを見たあと、最後に死んだアエルダリに目を向けた。{/n}「あのゼノ…。{name}、私たちを攻撃する直前の彼の目を見た？まるで光がないようだったわ。全部、これが原因なの？私は死にたくはないけど…あんな生き方もしたくない。だって自分が自分でなくなるのなら、何の意味もないでしょう？」

languages.text: {n}Terrifiée et confuse, Idira observe l'appareil, puis vous regarde et se tourne enfin vers le corps de l'Aeldari.{/n} « Ce xénos... Avez-vous vu ses yeux avant qu'il nous attaque, {name} ? On aurait dit qu'ils étaient vides de toute lumière. Et tout cela à cause de cette chose ? Je ne veux pas mourir, mais... Je ne veux pas non plus d'une telle vie. À quoi bon si je dois cesser d'être moi-même ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified and confused, Idira looks at the device, then at you, then at the dead Aeldari.{/n} "That xenos... {name}, did you see his eyes right before he attacked us? It was like there was no light left in them. And it's all because of this thing? I don't want to die, but... I don't want to live like that either. If it means I'll stop being myself, then what's the point?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Terrifiée et confuse, Idira observe l'appareil, puis vous regarde et se tourne enfin vers le corps de l'Aeldari.{/n} « Ce xéno... Avez-vous vu ses yeux avant qu'il nous attaque, {name} ? On aurait dit qu'ils étaient vides de toute lumière. Et tout cela à cause de cette chose ? Je ne veux pas mourir, mais... Je ne veux pas non plus d'une telle vie. À quoi bon si je dois cesser d'être moi-même ? »

languages.text: {n}Korkmuş ve kafası karışmış İdira önce cihaza, sonra sana ve ölü Aeldari'yi bakıyor.{/n} "O zeno... {name}, bize saldırmadan önce gözlerini gördün mü? Sanki içlerinde hiç ışık yokmuş gibiydi. Hepsi bu şey yüzünden mi? Ölmek istemiyorum ama... Öyle yaşamak da istemiyorum. O cihazla kendim olamayacaksam ne anlamı var ki?"
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified and confused, Idira looks at the device, then at you, then at the dead Aeldari.{/n} "That xenos... {name}, did you see his eyes right before he attacked us? It was like there was no light left in them. And it's all because of this thing? I don't want to die, but... I don't want to live like that either. If it means I'll stop being myself, then what's the point?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Korkmuş ve kafası karışmış İdira önce cihaza, sonra sana ve ölü Aeldari'yi bakıyor.{/n} "O zeno... {name}, bize saldırmadan önce gözlerini gördün mü? Sanki içlerinde hiç ışık yokmuş gibiydi. Hepsi bu şey yüzünden mi? Ölmek istemiyorum ama... Öyle yaşamak da istemiyorum. O cihazla kendim olamayacaksam ne anlamı var ki?"
